reports.Props: The corners of the letter that Hamilton brings to Burr are beginning to tear.  Please replace.
reports.Costumes: The sole of LaFayette's right shoe in his 'Story of Tonight' look is coming apart
reports.Lights: Nothing to report.  Cleaning up button of 'My Shot'
reports.Sounds: The gunshot at the end of Act I is delayed.  Can you check that out?
reports.General: Front of House advised: Spotted a cell phone from on 2nd mezz.

reports.Costumes: Eliza's quick change between the tavern and the ball is running behind.  Please work with her to tighten that up.
reports.Sounds: Lin's mic cut out in That Would be Enough and he could not be heard.
reports.General: Today's run time is 2 hour and 25 minutes
Tonight was a solid run.  No stutters or delays.
